gpt_university_description: Texas A&M University (TAMU) is a public research university in College Station, Texas, United States. Established in 1876, it has consistently been ranked as one of the top public institutions in the United States. Texas A&M offers over 400 degree programs across its 19 colleges.

The city offers a friendly, welcoming atmosphere with a strong sense of community. It has a vibrant downtown area with shops, restaurants, and entertainment options catering to the student population.
gpt_location_crime: College Station has a relatively low crime rate compared to other major cities in the United States. However, students should always take precautions and practice personal safety measures in any environment.
